content: In Chapter 4, the Destined One journeys to The Webbed Hollow, where a Violet Spider Queen and her six daughters concoct a plan to get revenge on Zhu Bajie, at the behest of their Daoist Master.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Myth: Wukong Walkthrough Sections', specifically from the subsection 'Chapter 4 - Rosy Cheeks, Gray Hair'.
The content is as follows:
In Chapter 4, the Destined One journeys to The Webbed Hollow, where a Violet Spider Queen and her six daughters concoct a plan to get revenge on Zhu Bajie, at the behest of their Daoist Master.
